GM-CSF is 2nd most stable feature (SHAP 0.283). Represents myeloid axis of immune dysregulation. Broadened from 'frailty GM-CSF myeloid' (0 results).
IL-2 shows largest effect size (d=0.809) in correlation analysis. Key T-cell proliferation marker.
IL-6 is classic inflammaging marker with 90% elevation in frail patients. Widely studied.
IL-17 represents Th17 pathway. Medium effect size (d=0.711). Autoimmunity link. Broadened from 'frailty interleukin-17 Th17' (0 results).
Core theoretical framework. Most cytokines elevated in frail (IL-6 +90%, IL-2 +281%).

IL-8 shows 19% elevation in frail. Neutrophil chemotaxis marker.
Eotaxin is 4th most important feature (SHAP 0.221). Type 2 immunity pathway. Broadened from 'frailty eosinophil eotaxin' (0 results).

IL-9 is protective feature (SHAP 0.208). Th2/mast cell pathway. Broadened from 'frailty interleukin-9 mast cell' (0 results).
TNF-α elevated in frail (+2%). Central pro-inflammatory cytokine.
IFN-γ elevated +34% in frail. Th1 cytokine and macrophage activator. Broadened from 'frailty interferon-gamma Th1' (0 results).
IL-1β inflammasome activation marker. Medium effect size. Broadened from 'frailty interleukin-1beta NLRP3' (0 results).
IL-10 elevated +29% in frail (compensatory). Anti-inflammatory cytokine.
PDGFbb shows protective SHAP (0.181). Tissue repair capacity.
FGF basic growth factor. Elevated in frail (inflammaging). Broadened from 'frailty FGF angiogenesis' (0 results).
MCP1 and IP10 elevated in frail. Monocyte/lymphocyte recruitment. Broadened from 'frailty chemokines MCP-1 IP-10' (0 results).
RANTES and MIP1b slightly lower in frail. Chemokine signaling. Broadened from 'frailty RANTES MIP-1' (0 results).
CCI_total is 2nd discriminating biomarker (SHAP 0.313). Multimorbidity burden.
HTN shows counterintuitive protective effect. Cardiovascular-immune interface.
Statin shows protective SHAP (0.182). Pleiotropic anti-inflammatory effects.
Polypharmacy counterintuitively protective. Healthcare engagement marker.
